messages.message: hopefully they dont have the ports closed that are needed to host from a machine. You might have to ask resnet for access....or something like that.....

Brian
Nah, you can change the port on a dedicated server, we could even use 80 if we have to.  Besides the master server is public, I have already got an apache server set up on my computer, and remote desktop even works, there isn't any reason games shouldn't work.
